Class AbstractParameters

java.lang.Object
org.mathoptimization.AbstractParameters
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Parameters
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrentsParameters, DichotomyParameters, FibonacciParameters, GoldenRatioParameters, ParabolaParameters
public abstract class AbstractParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameters
Abstraction for method optimization parameters.
